evidence.claim: Exponential Care uses AWS cloud infrastructure for its applications.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, indicating their health-tech focus.
Exponential Care leverages FHIR standards for seamless electronic health information exchange.
They utilize HL7 protocols for data integration with EHR systems.
Integration middleware is evidenced through their use of REST APIs documented on their developer portal.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities found on their site.
